page.title: 19LEISURE TIME in LEE.
page.content: My family has a lot of things to do, we can go to the beach,go swimming,play tennis and a lot more.I often play on my own in our garden. I play tennis on one of our walls in the drive or play swingball with my sister in the garden.I have a big room where I can play with my friends. Sometimes I cycle to Marek's house and play football.I go swimming quite a few times a week.My sister has several leisure activities - like playing with her guinea pig and drawing.We play football and rounders, thumper rounders too, which is fun.In Lee-on-the-Solent one of the best leisure places is the beach. We have an Arcade(with game machines), a Swimming pool,Tennis and Squash club and a Golf course.The church has a Sunday school and Family services. There is also a Community Centre.
